pullrequest.title: Adding xacro parameter to specify task name in plugin

content.raw:
Using the tests above, this works as expected. The name is `scan` in the dock task and `scan_and_dock` in the scan and dock task.

For some reason, I don’t have the phase2 worlds in this branch, but if I copy them over and use the phase2\_dock0.world and phase2\_scan\_and\_dock0.world I also get the same behavior. This surprises me because it looks like the task\_name variable has been set to “dock” and then passed into the task\_name element, but it must be overridden somewhere.

Using the dock0.world and scan\_and\_dock0.world in the repository I still get the old behavior and the task name is scan\_dock for both.
content.html:
Using the tests above, this works as expected. The name is scan in the dock task and scan_and_dock in the scan and dock task.

For some reason, I don’t have the phase2 worlds in this branch, but if I copy them over and use the phase2_dock0.world and phase2_scan_and_dock0.world I also get the same behavior. This surprises me because it looks like the task_name variable has been set to “dock” and then passed into the task_name element, but it must be overridden somewhere.

Using the dock0.world and scan_and_dock0.world in the repository I still get the old behavior and the task name is scan_dock for both.
